Line 11a - A copy of this form was provided to Executive Director and Principal Decision Maker of the organzation and a meeting was held with the Certified Public Accountant responsible for form preparation in advance of e-filing to discuss any questions or concerns.

The principal decision maker is compensated by a related organization which maintains a robust compensation review process that includes comparable studies with similarly sized organizations and is overseen by a compensation committee of the related organization's Board of Directors.
All governing documents are available for public inspection upon request.
